    -   take-home: 15 points

-   In-class: 75 minutes during Mon, Dec 4 lecture

    -   Released: Mon, Dec 4 \~ 3pm
    -   Due: Wed, Oct 6 at 11:59pm
    -   Similar in format to a lab/ HW

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}

-   Cross validation

-   Inference for multiple linear regression

-   Probabilities, odds, and odds ratios

## Outline of in-class portion {.midi}

-   Closed-book, closed-note.

-   8-10 questions, some with multiple parts

-   Question types:

    -   Multiple choice
    -   Short answer (no more than 3 sentences)
    -   True/ False.
        -   If false, write 1 - 2 sentence justification about why it is false. Must get justification correct to receive credit.
    -   Evaluate a response.

-   Last page will have analysis output.

-   Just need a pencil or pen. No calculator permitted on exam.
